document_data.caption: A wheel of cheese next to a cake and travel [[bread]].
document_data.name: Cheese
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cheese''' was a form of preserved [[milk]], derived from the solid portions of curdled milk being separated from the liquid (whey), that was prepared in a variety of ways. The color, flavor, marbling, and texture of cheese all varied depending upon how it was prepared. It was a product widely available in [[Faerûn]].

{{quote|Everything tastes better with cheese.|Excerpt from [[Red Wizard]] [[Lanneth]]'s journal}}
document_data.Terminology:
Cheese was most often found in {{SIAdj|1|lb}} circular or elliptic wheels, or in rectangular loaves, which could then be divided further in wedges, or hunks. Some cheeses could also be found in large {{SIAdj|100|lb|k}} wheys, for example when ordered in bulk from ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.

In [[Scornubel]], cheese was often sold in chunks known as a "fist".

Types of Cheese.Aerdruth: A variety of crumbly cheese from [[Tethyr]] named after the Aerdruth family that created the recipe long before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20240501054712/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_040506-06.htm| title = So Saith Ed May – Jul 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 1-5-2024}}
Types of Cheese.Amaratha's: A very good sharp marbled green cheese made at [[Amaratha's Teahouse]] in the [[Dalelands]].<ref name="Vol189>
Types of Cheese.Arabellan cheddar: Once described as "the most popular cheddar cheese of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]". It was a sturdy, orange cheese that traveled extremely well.
Types of Cheese.Askata: A strongly flavored cheese from [[Impiltur]]. It was yellow and crumbled easily.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 22: Night Ale at the Meet}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|28}}
Types of Cheese.Beregost Blue: A type of cheese, streaked with blue, produced in the town of [[Beregost]].
Types of Cheese.Calmarr: A variety of [[Turmish]]ite soft and crumbly cheese flavored with chives and other herbs, also known as [[ornsoelaun]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20240501054732/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_050607-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed May – Jul 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 1-5-2024}}
Types of Cheese.Caribou cheese: A variety of cheese from the [[Great Glacier]] made from sour and fatty [[caribou]] milk.
Types of Cheese.Chessentan Lotus Cheese: Popular in [[Chessenta]] and in the empires on the southeastern side of the Sea of Fallen Stars for a very long time, it was normally mixed with lotus flower petals, although there were other Chessentan cheeses that were mixed with less exotic petals, such as rose or honeysuckle.
Types of Cheese.Churlgo Cheese: Several types of halfling-made cheese from [[Daggerford]]'s farmalnds – an acquired taste among many.
Types of Cheese.Corwellian sharp: A type of sharp cheese from [[Caer Corwell]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].
Types of Cheese.Cream cheese: a type of soft, spreadable dairy product, similar to [[yak butter]] but less delicate and more plainly-tasting.
Types of Cheese.Dale cheese: A variety of hard cheese filleld with diced [[olive]]s from the [[Great Dale]].
Types of Cheese.Damarite Red: Also known as Bloodcheese, it came from the lands of the Bloodstone. It was made from [[goat]]'s milk, which imparted a sharp, hearty, pungent tang.
Types of Cheese.Death Cheese: Made from the [[milk]] of the deadly [[catoblepas]]. It was produced in [[Cormyr]] and [[Sembia]] by farmers who hired adventurers to herd and milk the catoblepas.
Types of Cheese.Dunbradar cheese: A sharply-flavored goat's cheese with nuts.{{Cite polyhedron/118/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Dunbridges and the Duskwood|13}}
Types of Cheese.Durinbold cheese: A type of creamy and nutty sheep's milk cheese found in the [[Western Heartlands]].
Types of Cheese.Elturian Grey: Reminiscent of blue cheese, but had black veins. It was also known as stonework or dwarfcheese, and had a distinctly pungent flavor.
Types of Cheese.Farmer's cheese: Also known as pot cheese or cottage cheese, it was mostly consumed locally as it did not travel well.
Types of Cheese.Goat's milk cheese: A common variety of floral and hay flavored cheese made from [[goat]]'s [[milk]].<ref name="Vol61>
Types of Cheese.Goblin cheese: A foul-smelling crumbly blue-cheese-like substance.{{Cite organized play/LGR/Dungeon of the Hark|5,7}}
Types of Cheese.Green Calishite cheese|Green Calishite: Made by the [[Calishite]]s, who mixed curry into their cheeses to enhance the flavor. The potent cheese had an aquamarine hue due to the curry, and was extremely spicy.
Types of Cheese.Hammaree: A variety of crumbly cheese from Tethyr named after the Hammaree family that created the recipe long before the 14{{th}} century DR.
Types of Cheese.Hearthfire: amber-hued, sharp, and crumbly cheese from [[Narfell]] made using milk from [[korontaun]], a local species of shaggy sheep.{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20240408193846/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_010203-09.htm| title = So Saith Ed Jan – Mar 2009| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 1-5-2024}}
Types of Cheese.Luiren spring cheese: Also known as Halfling's Cheese, or mind cheese, it was pungently aromatic and soft. Although not very tasty to humans, it had a profound effect on [[halfling]]s, who reacted to it as if it were a strong [[wine]] or narcotic. In some instances, halflings could become addicted to it as they would to a mind-affecting drug.
Types of Cheese.Luthland cheese: Also known as [[sharpsair]], a variety of strong white cheese with a strong spicy flavor reminiscent of [[mustard]] and [[horseradish]] from [[Luthbaern]].{{Cite polyhedron/132/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: The Border Kingdoms|13}}
Types of Cheese.Mist cheese: Produced in [[Loudwater Vale]], it was a rich, soft white cheese that became translucent when sliced thinly. It was also known as Ethereal Cheese by the elves.
Types of Cheese.[[Nut cheese]]s: Most prevalent in [[Silverymoon]], [[Mirabar]], [[Sundabar]], and the other cities of the [[Savage Frontier]], they were a traditional way to preserve un-shelled nuts (such as hickory nuts, walnuts, and chestnuts).
Types of Cheese.Nutmeg cheese: A type of cheese flavored with [[nutmeg]] from [[Ravens Bluff]].{{Cite organized play/LC/Cravings|5}}
Types of Cheese.Obaleth: a sharp and strong-flavored cheese from the hamlet of [[Sevenecho (hamlet)|Sevenecho]] in [[the Vast]].{{Cite dungeon/75/Into the Nest of Vipers|66}}
Types of Cheese.Pepper cheese: A tangy, supple cheese created by mixing southern [[spices]] with a mixture of goat and [[cow]] cheese. It was easily identified by the rind, which was leathery and dotted with peppercorns.
Types of Cheese.Redruck: Type of one of the sharpest cheeses.
Types of Cheese.Roaroke: A variety of expensive and rare cheese popular in the [[Border Kingdoms]].{{cite web| url = http://web.archive.org/web/20240501054711/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_040506-09.htm| title = So Saith Ed Apr – Jun 2009| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
Types of Cheese.Sarm: Orange cheese flavored with [[wine]], similar in flavor to sharp red cheddar.
Types of Cheese.Shantan Slice: A sharp red cheese from the [[Grand Duchy of Shantal]].
Types of Cheese.Sharpcrumble cheese: A type of crumbly white cheese bade by [[Fulbar Hardcheese]]'s family in Daggerford.<ref name="Vol36>
Types of Cheese.Turmish black: A variety of cheese made in Turmish and the [[Vilhon Reach]].
Types of Cheese.Turmish brick: A cheese mixed with the heavy red wine that was common among the Turmish. It was a sweet, crumbly, burgundy cheese, wrapped in red wax, and had an easily identifiable, rectangular shape.
Types of Cheese.Ulgarthan cheese: sharp cheese from the [[Utter East]] with notable purple marbling.
Types of Cheese.Vilhon blanc: Made with a lighter wine than Turmish Brick, it was a lighter cheese with a sweet, delicate flavor. The cheese was typically consumed locally, and was rarely found beyond the Sea of Fallen Stars or [[Sembia]].
Types of Cheese.Vilksmaarg: A salty, pungent, herbal goat cheese, produced in [[Purple_Rocks#Locations|Vilkstead]], capital of [[Utheraal]]. It was most popular in [[Sword Coast]] taverns.
Types of Cheese.Waterdhavian cheese|Waterdhavian: Also called eyed cheese, holed cheese, or arrow-shot, it was popular and common in [[Waterdeep]].
Types of Cheese.Whitesides: A variety of cheese produced in the ancient realms of [[Athalantar]].
Types of Cheese.Yak butter: A mild and delicate cream cheese made from yak milk. At one time, it could be found from the [[Spine of the World]] to the [[Hordelands]].
